beer.beer_description:
The refreshing wheat beer named Fénix (Phoenix) offers consumers a light flavour and refreshing aroma which originates from wheat malt, orange peel and a dash of coriander. Served in an original glass with a crescent of orange. The rest is up to you: one of the options is "butcher style" (throw the fruit right into the beer).

The brand was launched in the market in February. 2012. It is designed for people who prefer doing things their own way.


Svěží pšeničné pivo Fénix nabízí spotřebitelům lehčí chuť a svěží aroma díky použití pšeničného sladu, pomerančové kůry a špetky koriandru. Je servírováno v originální sklenici se srpkem pomeranče. Každý si tak svého Fénix může užít po svém – například tzv. na řezníka, kdy se dužina z citrusu vhodí přímo do piva.

Značka byla na trh uvedena v únoru 2012 a je určena všem, kteří v sobě chtějí probudit Fénixe.

items.checkin_comment: 0,33l Flasche. Goldgelb trüb, wenig Schaum. Sehr kräftiger Duft, leider mit deutlichem Fehlton. Zimt, Kreuzkümmel, Korriander. Sehr Gewürzlastig. Auch im Geschmack fast nur Gewürze. Zimt und Korriander, zu wenig Orange. Leichte Säure. Im Abgang auch nur G

items.badge_description: Known for their pale lagers and pilsners, the Czech Republic has a long standing tradition of brewing. With the highest beer consumption per capita in the world, you’ll fit right in. That's 55 different beers from a brewery from the Czech Republic. Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.badge_description: Hazy and white like a winter storm, but best enjoyed on a warm sunny day. This specific style of wheat beer brings with it a subtle mix of spices and hops, giving it a distinct flavor with little bitterness. That's 5 different beers categorized as a Witbier. Try 5 more for Level 2!

If your mash uses more than 50% wheat, you’ve got yourself a wheat beer. This diverse family includes goses, hefeweizens, American wheat ales, and more! That's 40 different beers in the "Wheat" category! Try 5 more for Level 9!

user.location: Pioneer Valley | Bryant | Cape Cod | Trastevere | PVD | Wolly Beach | Denver | Seattle

items.badge_description: Join us to toast glass beer bottles! The U.N. named 2022 the International Year of Glass, recognizing its valuable role in society. Cheers to the sustainable, 100% recyclable glass bottle that keeps beer cold, fresh & delicious. #ChooseGlass

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 25 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 6!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 20 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Hazy and white like a winter storm, but best enjoyed on a warm sunny day. This specific style of wheat beer brings with it a subtle mix of spices and hops, giving it a distinct flavor with little bitterness. That's 5 different beers categorized as a Witbier. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Každý si tak svého Fénix může užít po svém – například tzv. na řezníka, kdy se dužina z citrusu vhodí přímo do piva.

Značka byla na trh uvedena v únoru 2012 a je určena všem, kteří v sobě chtějí probudit Fénixe.

items.checkin_comment: Switching all BA ratings over to UT.

beer.beer_description:
The refreshing wheat beer named Fénix (Phoenix) offers consumers a light flavour and refreshing aroma which originates from wheat malt, orange peel and a dash of coriander. Served in an original glass with a crescent of orange. The rest is up to you: one of the options is "butcher style" (throw the fruit right into the beer).

The brand was launched in the market in February. 2012. It is designed for people who prefer doing things their own way.

Každý si tak svého Fénix může užít po svém – například tzv. na řezníka, kdy se dužina z citrusu vhodí přímo do piva.

Značka byla na trh uvedena v únoru 2012 a je určena všem, kteří v sobě chtějí probudit Fénixe.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 75 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 16!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 380 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

Known for their pale lagers and pilsners, the Czech Republic has a long standing tradition of brewing. With the highest beer consumption per capita in the world, you’ll fit right in. That's 45 different beers from a brewery from the Czech Republic. Try 5 more for Level 10!
